text: Now that PrettyTables is doing the printing of DataFrames in the REPL, do we have the ability to export a `DataFrame` as LaTex?

elements.text: Now that PrettyTables is doing the printing of DataFrames in the REPL, do we have the ability to export a

text:
```	# Use pretty_table to print the output.
	open("out/senators_per_resident_race.tex", "w") do f
		pretty_table(
			f,
			out, # a DataFrame
			backend = :latex,
			nosubheader = true,
			wrap_table = false,
			formatters = ft_printf("%0.1f"))
	end```

elements.text:

text: Actually DataFrames has supported LaTeX output for a long time, before PrettyTables.

elements.text: Actually DataFrames has supported LaTeX output for a long time, before PrettyTables.
